channel.title: CATS Applicant Tracking System
channel.description: Recent content on CATS Applicant Tracking System

item.title: Resources
item.description: Chrome Extension The CATS Chrome Extension automates parsing of candidate data from popular websites and social networks like LinkedIn, Monster, and CareerBuilder. Download Now Firefox Add-On The CATS Firefox Add-on automates parsing of candidate data from popular websites and social networks like LinkedIn, Monster, and CareerBuilder. Download Now WordPress Plugin This plugin is used to pull your job listings from the CATS Applicant Tracking System and display them on your WordPress site by using a shortcode.

item.title: Why Cats
item.description: CATS helps thousands of companies from all over the world fill their hiring needs. From one person recruitment shops to the Fortune 500 operations, our customers rely on us to help them grow.

item.title: Use Cases
item.description: Currently, nearly 6,000 professional recruiters in 70 countries use CATS to solve their hiring challenges. CATS customers include small and large executive search firms, staffing agencies, technology startups, non-profits, Fortune 500 companies — anyone who needs to manage the hiring process in a professional and efficient manner. Play Video Master Technology Group logo Master Technology Group Installation Company Eden Prairie, MN Everything is all-in-one in the CATS system. When I have an open position, I can create it very easily, very quickly in CATS, and with one click of the button it sends it to every job board that I use.

item.title: Features and Benefits
item.description: The Applicant Tracking System that started it all For professional recruiters The ultimate tool for professional recruiters, CATS Pro has everything you need to be a top performer in the competitive world of talent acquisition. Build your custom hiring process using our industry-leading workflow system. Manage The heart of recruitment is your client relationships. Our CRM was designed with professional recruiting in mind. Engage​ All of our communication tools plus mass emailing and multiple industry leading email marketing integrations.

item.title: Pricing
item.description: Get Started Includes a customizable careers page (or embeddable jobs widget for your website) and our industry-leading workflow to supercharge your hiring process. Annually / Monthly $99 / $69 per user Start Free Trial Included Features: Meeting Scheduler SMS Texting (US & Canada) 2- way Calendar & Email sync Recruiting browser extension Custom access levels Sponsored Job Posting $1000 $500 data migration

item.title: Data Processing Policy
item.description: The processing of Personal Data in a secure and transparent way is important to us at CATS. Because of this, we are committed to processing Personal Data in accordance with the EU’s General Data Protection Regulation (“GDPR”). This Data Processing Addendum (“DPA”) amends the Terms of Service agreement between CATS Software, Inc (“CATS”) and you as a customer. Definitions “Controller” means the natural or legal person, public authority, agency or other body which, alone or jointly with others, determines the purposes and means of the processing of personal data.

item.title: Terms of Service
item.description: By using the catsone.com web site (“Service”), a service of CATS Software, Inc., you are agreeing to be bound by the following terms and conditions (“Terms of Service”). CATS Software Inc. reserves the right to update and change the Terms of Service from time to time without notice. Any new features that augment or enhance the current Service, including the release of new tools and resources, shall be subject to the Terms of Service.

item.title: Terms of Use
item.description: These Terms of Use are effective as of November 29, 2011. 1. Rules of Engagement This website, www.catsone.com (the “Site”), is owned and operated by CATS Software, Inc. (referred to as “CATS Software” “we,” “us” or “our”). PLEASE READ THESE TERMS OF USE CAREFULLY BEFORE USING THIS SITE. By using this Site you agree to these terms of use (the “Terms”). If you do not agree to the Terms, please do not use the Site.
